The capital city is Barentu. Other towns include Agordat (the former capital), Molki, Sebderat and Teseney. The region also includes the following subregions: * Agordat City * Barentu City * Dghe * Forto * Gogne * Haykota * Logo Anseba * Mensura * Mogolo * Molki * Omhajer * Shambuko * Tesseney * Upper Gash Category:Regions of Eritrea
